org.jamwiki.db

Class DatabaseConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.db.DatabaseConnection

  • public class DatabaseConnection
extends Object
    This class provides methods for retrieving database connections, executing queries, and setting up connection pools.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • closeConnection

        protected static void closeConnection(Connection conn,
                                      Statement stmt,
                                      ResultSet rs)
        Utility method for closing a database connection, a statement and a result set. This method must ALWAYS be called for any connection retrieved by the getConnection() method, and the connection SHOULD NOT have already been closed.
        Parameters:
        conn - A database connection, retrieved using DatabaseConnection.getConnection(), that is to be closed. This connection SHOULD NOT have been previously closed.
        stmt - A statement object that is to be closed. May be null.
        rs - A result set object that is to be closed. May be null.

      • closeConnection

        protected static void closeConnection(Connection conn,
                                      Statement stmt)
        Utility method for closing a database connection and a statement. This method must ALWAYS be called for any connection retrieved by the getConnection() method, and the connection SHOULD NOT have already been closed.
        Parameters:
        conn - A database connection, retrieved using DatabaseConnection.getConnection(), that is to be closed. This connection SHOULD NOT have been previously closed.
        stmt - A statement object that is to be closed. May be null.

      • closeConnection

        protected static void closeConnection(Connection conn)
        Utility method for closing a database connection. This method must ALWAYS be called for any connection retrieved by the getConnection() method, and the connection SHOULD NOT have already been closed.
        Parameters:
        conn - A database connection, retrieved using DatabaseConnection.getConnection(), that is to be closed. This connection SHOULD NOT have been previously closed.

      • closeConnectionPool

        protected static void closeConnectionPool()
                                   throws SQLException
        Close the connection pool, to be called for example during Servlet shutdown.

        Note that this only applies if the DataSource was created by JAMWiki; in the case of a container DataSource obtained via JNDI this method does nothing except clear the static reference to the DataSource.

        Throws:
        SQLException

      • closeResultSet

        protected static void closeResultSet(ResultSet rs)
        Utility method for closing a result set that may or may not be null. The result set SHOULD NOT have already been closed.
        Parameters:
        rs - A statement object that is to be closed. May be null.

      • closeStatement

        protected static void closeStatement(Statement stmt)
        Utility method for closing a statement that may or may not be null. The statement SHOULD NOT have already been closed.
        Parameters:
        stmt - A statement object that is to be closed. May be null.

      • executeSequenceQuery

        protected static int executeSequenceQuery(String sql,
                                          String field,
                                          Connection conn)
                                   throws SQLException
        Execute a query to retrieve a single integer value, generally the result of SQL such as "select max(id) from table".
        Parameters:
        sql - The SQL to execute.
        field - The field that is returned containing the integer value.
        conn - The database connection to use when querying.
        Returns:
        Returns the result of the query or 0 if no result is found.
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • executeUpdate

        protected static int executeUpdate(String sql,
                                   Connection conn)
                            throws SQLException
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • executeUpdateNoException

        protected static void executeUpdateNoException(String sql,
                                               Connection conn)
        Execute a string representing a SQL statement, suppressing any exceptions.

      • getConnection

        protected static Connection getConnection()
                                   throws SQLException
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • testDatabase

        public static void testDatabase(String driver,
                                String url,
                                String user,
                                String password,
                                boolean existence)
                         throws SQLException,
                                ClassNotFoundException
        Test whether the database identified by the given parameters can be connected to.
        Parameters:
        driver - A String indicating the full path for the database driver class.
        url - The JDBC driver URL.
        user - The database user.
        password - The database user password.
        existence - Set to true if a test query should be executed.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any failure occurs while creating a test connection.
        ClassNotFoundException

      • getTestConnection

        protected static Connection getTestConnection(String driver,
                                              String url,
                                              String user,
                                              String password)
                                       throws SQLException
        Return a connection to the database with the specified parameters. The caller must close this connection when finished!
        Parameters:
        driver - A String indicating the full path for the database driver class.
        url - The JDBC driver URL.
        user - The database user.
        password - The database user password.
        Throws:
        SQLException - Thrown if any failure occurs while getting the test connection.

                                                                          throws SQLException
        Starts a transaction using the default settings.
        Returns:
        TransactionStatus representing the status of the Transaction
        Throws:
        SQLException

                                                                             throws SQLException
        Starts a transaction, using the given TransactionDefinition
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        TransactionStatus
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • rollbackOnException

        protected static void rollbackOnException(org.springframework.transaction.TransactionStatus status,
                                          Throwable ex)
                                   throws org.springframework.transaction.TransactionException
        Perform a rollback, handling rollback exceptions properly.
        Parameters:
        status - object representing the transaction
        ex - the thrown application exception or error
        Throws:
        org.springframework.transaction.TransactionException - in case of a rollback error

      • commit

        protected static void commit(org.springframework.transaction.TransactionStatus status)
        Commit the current transaction. Note if the transaction has been programmatically marked for rollback then a rollback will occur instead.
        Parameters:
        status - TransactionStatus representing the status of the transaction
